layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x88
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x88
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x64
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 398x19
          text run at (0,0) width 398: "Test passes if the \"Filler Text\" below is on the right side of the box."
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,36) size 202x28

          LayoutText {#text} at (141,1) size 60x19
            text run at (141,1) width 60: "Filler Text"
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,22) size 202x6
